text: Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Jerusalem, Jerusalem, na kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavara haŋɨnɨŋ yɨvutatamandana. Kamata kru Got na kɨndanayɨ sɨmbɨhi pandu haŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋamɨŋa yɨvutatamɨrɨm tɨmba kavarandana. Sambɨ ñɨmbɨrɨ nandɨ ñɨŋisɨm haŋɨnɨŋ akakara nɨŋum nuŋandɨ ñɨŋisɨmɨŋ ambɨndɨwɨvu yɨvuñɨmbɨrɨndi maña yɨvuñɨmbɨrɨman vata andɨndin. Hara narɨ yakɨwɨrɨvarandara.
